natural_language_response:
Based on the information provided in the Inventory Management policy, Dataco Global defines slow-moving inventory as:

Items that have not been issued or used within the last 6 months.

The company also recognizes a related category called "no mover" inventory, which refers to items that have not been issued or used within the last 12 months.

The policy indicates that there is a quarterly review process in place for slow-moving and non-moving inventory, which suggests that the company actively monitors and manages these inventory categories to optimize their stock levels and prevent excessive buildup of idle inventory.
